items.title: US strike kills dozens at Yemen migrant detention center, Yemeni officials say
items.description: A U.S. airstrike in Yemen killed at least 68 people at a migrant detention center in the Saada Governorate, according to the country's Civil Defense o...

items.title: North Korea confirms 'heroic' troops fought Ukraine in Russia's Kursk region
items.description: North Korean authorities confirmed for the first time that the country's forces fought against Ukrainian troops in Russia's Kursk region.

items.title: Elon Musk approval low, reflecting opposition to Trump cuts: POLL
items.description: Elon Musk's popularity is well underwater in public views of his work for President Donald Trump, according to an ABC News/Washington Post/Ipsos poll.

items.title: WATCH:  Speedboat goes flying during competition on Arizona's Lake Havasu
items.description: A speedboat flipped and went airborne during a competition Saturday on Lake Havasu in Arizona. The two racers onboard were said to be a little banged ...

items.title: WATCH:  Meerkat siblings wrestle at zoo
items.description: These little meerkat siblings were captured wrestling in a tube at the Oakland Zoo in California.
